title: Champion suggestion
body: Not really a concept but would it be cool if we have a champion that kinda comedic and break the 4th wall like Deadpool with his jokes. So like when taunting an enemy champion and if they if ur team have the same champ it would point it out.

replies.body: with mordekaiser not really, unless you plan to last hit champions with your ultimate ...
mordekaiser breaks the fourth wall with 'you only need to click once,fool '
Primetime{{champion:119}} sort of does that. His dialogue is semi-4th wall breaking? It makes reference to LCS casting aNyway.
